CustomField.formula:
First_Name__c & " " & Last_Name__c & " - " &
IF(LEN(TEXT(Net_Donation__c))=2, TEXT(Net_Donation__c)&".00", IF(LEN(TEXT(Net_Donation__c))=4, TEXT(Net_Donation__c)&"0", TEXT(Net_Donation__c) ) )
& " - " &
IF(LEN(TEXT( DAY( cpm__Date__c ) ))=1, "0"& TEXT( DAY( cpm__Date__c ) ), TEXT( DAY( cpm__Date__c ) ))
& "/" &
IF(LEN(TEXT( MONTH( cpm__Date__c ) ))=1, "0"& TEXT( MONTH( cpm__Date__c ) ), TEXT( MONTH( cpm__Date__c ) ))
& "/" &
TEXT( YEAR( cpm__Date__c ) )
CustomField.label: Donor Gift Transaction Name
